title: The Weaver Heir
description: Kayden Joughes didn't ask for magic, especially to have it in Merrister where it has been forbidden for generations. With demons attacking from the Boundary constantly he sets off on a quest to put a stop to it. Allies and romance mark his journey across the country searching for the most powerful magical artifact known to mankind, the Throne of Endexius. Meanwhile, Lady Commander of Aristell, Alanaia must contend with the cutthroat nature of capital's politics. With friend and foe alike around every corner she must be careful as rebellion stirs in the north threatening to dismantle everything she has worked towards.
author: J.S. Young
